description:
Ru Baraba Dom is the commander of the Raalgon cruiser Doroume, 66th Detached Fleet. As the war progresses, http://anidb.net/ch7032 [Azalyn] comes to trust his intelligent advice. Unlike many of his fellow colleagues, Dom respects and admires http://anidb.net/ch7034 [Tylor] for his fighting and tactical abilities. Both Tylor and Dom recognize that wars can only be won when no one fights.
He is loyal to the young empress and stands firmly in Lonawer`s camp to find a way to end the war honorably and with a minimum of bloodshed.
name: Ru Baraba Dom
